Reviews.Title: I love mine
Reviews.Author: Christina Wells
Reviews.Content: I have had my Samsung for about a month now it takes good quality pictures, very clear and crisp better than other camerasI have tried with great disappointment in the past.For the price this camera is greatvery easy on the eyes nice shiny charcoal black color looks sleek. and and pretty light as well but not too light nice....I think I will have mine for a while...

Reviews.Title: great if i hadn't lost it
Reviews.Content: I only got to use this camera for about 1 day.  bought it for a trip with family.  lost it the 2nd day out because the darn thing is so small & compact. fortunately, I had downloaded most of the pics I had taken. Fortunately, I got it on sale for about $65 so I didnt want to curse the sky when I realized I'd lost the camera.  would love to replace but I might need a slightly larger model.

Reviews.Title: Samsung SL502
Reviews.Author: H.Sun
Reviews.Content: It was good, and the only thing is that I ordered a black one but a red one was sent to me.
